__TOC__

If you are nominating yourself your wiki page should be titled as follows wiki.ubuntu.com/WashingtonTeam/LeadershipNominations/<period>/<yourname>

Nomination Periods: 

The recommended template is below

How to use the Template:

# At the top of this page select "More Actions: Raw Text" and hit "Go" to view the raw wiki syntax of the template
# To create your page, just put <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu.com/WashingtonTeam/LeadershipNominations/January2010/yourname]]</nowiki> into your browser, it will present you with a page saying "This page does not exist yet. You can create a new empty page, or use one of the page templates." - OK, click the "Create new empty page" link.
# Copy the template from the first step into your empty page and fill in information as needed

Recommended Template:

----

Ubuntu Washington LoCo Leadership Nomination For <name>
------------------------------
---------------

* Email:
* IRC: 
* Launchpad Profile:
* Wiki Profile Page:

=== Bio ===

A short summary outlining the work the candidate has performed in Ubuntu and outlining leadership experience (if available).

=== Future Goals for team ===

Outline a set of goals and achievements that the candidate would like to focus on during term

=== Testimonials ===

Here others can offer testimonials in the following format:

* Testimonial content - Name Of Person
